commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Base8adf9e"

diff:
"e8adf9e Bug 330710, Replace obsolete preventBubble/preventCapture with stopPropagation, r=neil, r=mconnor, sr=jst
diff --git a/browser/base/content/tabbrowser.xml b/browser/base/content/tabbrowser.xml
index 767ae71..7c09850 100644
--- a/browser/base/content/tabbrowser.xml
+++ b/browser/base/content/tabbrowser.xml
@@ -2166,7 +2166,7 @@
         <parameter name="event"/>
         <body>
           <![CDATA[
-            event.preventBubble();
+            event.stopPropagation();
             var tn = document.tooltipNode;
             if (tn.localName != "tab")
               return false; // Not a tab, so cancel the tooltip
"
